list.description:
ОБНОВЛЕНО!!!
Прицел для танка СССР Т-62, снаряд 3БМ3 и 3ОФ11.
Прицельная сетка для снаряда 3БМ3. Прямоугольники для снаряда 3ОФ3. До 1 километра работает с минимальной погрешностью. После 1 километра погрешность увеличивается. Дистанция по прямоугольнику определяется в двух вариациях.
1. По длине танка.
2. По высоте танка.
Если при вводе дальности прямоугольник совпал по длине ИЛИ по высоте, значит дальность определена.
По ширине танка дальность не определяется.
Так жесть время полета на данную дистанцию.
В архиве есть текстовый файл, как установить настройки в игре для корректной работы прице

SIDAM 25 SPAA Fictional Sight

A simple sight with lack of central pointer because AAs like SIDAM don't need them. This sight was Inspired by helicopters like KA-50 and Apache gunner sights when firing ATGM.
#SIDAM25

Yo guys,

I made a user sight for the Challenger 2 to make it more like the FCS the tank uses. Due to my limited knowledge it doesn't function as a FCS and is purely for show. Anyway to me personally it looks damn cooler than the generic crosshairs the game uses and is based off Steel Beasts.

For the best look you have to enable crosshair lighting.

The epic skin in the picture is by Badass_Jellykin.
https://live.warthunder.com/post/819790/en/

#challenger_2 #CR2 #challenger2 #challengerii #challenger_ii #challenger

XM-803/MBT-70/KPZ-70 Gun Sight
Semi-realistic sight based on real historic sight of #MBT70. I found the historic sight to be unsatisfactory so I modified it. Brought the vertical range scale closer to the cross hair, distance correction and range for easier use. Suitable for XM-803
#MBT70
#KPZ70
#XM803

NOW OBSOLETE DUE TO SIGHT MAGNIFICATION BUFF
Updated ZTZ-96/ZTZ-96A | TYPE-96/TYPE-96A Fictional Digital Gunner Sight
My update on the 96A/96 gun sight. More ''cleaner'', got rid of lines that are unnecessary and got rid of central circle. This sight is suitable for long range sniping.
#ZTZ96
#ZTZ96A
#TYPE96

Прицел для вертолета СССР Ми-4В.
Простой и удобный прицел для вертолета. Есть время полета на разную дистанцию снаряда 2П32М/К-4В - ПТУР.
Удачи на полях Вар Тандер!

Sight for the helicopter of the USSR Mi-4V.
A simple and convenient sight for a helicopter. There is a flight time for a different distance of the 2P32M / K-4V - ATGM shell.
Good luck on the fields of Var Thunder!

Прицел для танка СССР ИТ-1.
Простой и удобный прицел для танка ИТ-1. Есть время полета на разную дистанцию.
Удачи на полях Вар Тандер!

Sight for the tank of the USSR IT-1.
A simple and convenient sight for the IT-1 tank. There is a flight time at different distances.
Good luck on the fields of Var Thunder!

Прицел для танка СССР Т-62, снаряд 3БМ4 (стоковый снаряд).
Есть прицельная сетка, а также при вводе дальности отрисовываются прямоугольники для более четкого понимания дистанции. До 1 километра работает с минимальной погрешностью. После 1 километра погрешность увеличивается. Дистанция по прямоугольнику определяется в двух вариациях.
1. По длине танка.
2. По высоте танка.
Если при вводе дальности прямоугольник совпал по длине ИЛИ по высоте, значит дальность определена.
По ширине танка дальность не определяется.
Так жесть определение пробития на данной дистанции, что позволяет определить, сможет

Japanese Type 74G Custom Sight: Model M3A1 Circular-type
This isn't the first custom sight I have created, but it's the first one I'm posting.

This sight features 2 rings which are placed at the scope's visual limits, or near them anyway. These rings also just so happen to line up with horizontal distance lines or whatever they are called.

It's by no means perfect, and I do plan on releasing a more refined version.
Improvements to be made:
1. Thicker view-limit lines (The circle things)
2. More horizontal distance lines
3. More vertical distance lines (Maybe)

Выпиливание статической части коллиматора на самолетах МиГ-19ПТ и МиГ-21СМТ.

Распаковать в папку UserSkins в директории игры с заменой файлов, выбрать пользовательский камуфляж во внешнем виде самолета.

Чтобы воспроизвести эффект на МиГ-21Ф-13, МиГ-19С, МиГ-21МФ, J-6A, J-7II - переименовать папку и .blk файл в ней соответственно названию самолета.

Realistic sight for AMX30 B2 and BRENUS based on M581 gunner's optic.

Small adaptation for the game (displaying telemetry and distance correction)

You can use the sight with "standard sniper view" or with "gunner's optics view"

The pack contain folder and files:
M581 gunner's optic:
-AMX 30 B2
-AMX 30 B2 Brenus
-AMX 30 Super
-AMX 40
-AMX 32
-AMX 32 (105)

M581 With Adaptation for WT (look the sreen "adapted sight" for see the modification).
-AMX 30 B2
AMX 30 B2 Brenus
-AMX 30 Super
-AMX 40
-AMX 32
-AMX 32 (105)

For install, look that tutoriel (Eng...
A noob friendly basic sight for thew Centurion Mk. 5 AVRE. Each thin line represents 50 meters of range, enjoy!

#rooikat_mk1_d #rooikat_mk_1d #rooikat #rooikat_mk1d This is my first custom sight. I made it for the rooikat, because it had no earlier sights. It can be ranged up to 4km, with the apfsds having two different axises for gun elevation because of making aiming easier and preferation. I hope you enjoyed my attempt at a custom sight. Enjoy!

(REQUEST)

Hi all,
I have no skill in these matters but if anyone feels like it I think a Battlefield Bad Company 2 or Battlefield 3 type sight for the 125mm guns in game would be really fun. BFBC2 might be easier as it hasnt got the text round the sides, and would light up the correct colour, but wither would be really fun. Idk about sight increments for apfsds, maybe every 500m or 1km?

Anyway, hope someone else enjoys this!

NB - Attached sight is the closest I've found, NOT MY WORK. Can't upload to this section without a sight folder

#battlefield #t72 #t80 #t64 #soviet #russia

For tank T-80U sight.

Agava-2 Historical Gunner Sight.

#t80u
Murican pack updated :D Have a noice day! :P #m1a1 #m1abrams #m1abrahms #m1a2 #m1a1_abrams #m1ip

Germoney sight pack to counter new russian MBTs is finally updated :D #radkampwagen_90 #leopard1 #leopard1a1 #leopard2a5 #leopard2a4 #leopard2k #leopard2 #leopard1l44

Sorry for the time you had to wait to have this pack. I have updated my EMES 15 sights, added dot version of this sight, for both magnifications. This pack have like 12 or more completely new sights. Hope you'll enjoy!

Schindibee's fictional "SCOLIA" Sight for Centauro and Cenaturo ROMOR

#customsight #sight #fictional #scolia #centauro #centauro_romor

This is a fully fictional sight for the Italian Centauro B1 and Centauro ROMOR light tank destoryers armed with the 105mm canon, including the following easy to use features:

- Simplified ranging scale for main ammo, up to 3'200 meters
- Ranging funnels configured for tank lengths of 7m (full line) and width of 3.5m (dotted line)
- Deflection shooting aim crosses for targets traveling at 20 km/h (inner) and 40 km/h (outer)

The following sight variants are i

Pizza Pasta Spaghettini tankette needs sum sights too!
Italian pack with sight for all #ariete tanks and #centauro family of vehicles is here for you!
Ultimate russian pack is here! If you need sights for #t64a, #t80b , #t80u, #t72b , #t72a, #t64b and #t55am and you like this design just take it :D

Realistic sight for M1 Abrams series.

You can use with standard view or gunner's view. Use telemetry in gunner's view for compensate the parralaxe.

Contains folder and files for:
-M1
-IP M1
-M1A1
-M1A2
-M1A1HC
-M1A1 AIM (Squadron vehicle)
-M1A2 Sep V1
- NEW - M1 KVT (Premium)

For install, look that tutoriel (English or french)
https://forum.warthunder.com/t/install-a-custom-sight/6915
https://forum.warthunder.com/t/installer-un-viseur-personalise/3448


I will try to find informations for other Abrams and update this post.

#abrams #realistic...

ZTZ59D1 Digital Gunner Sight
Originally made by BarteG98PL for T64A and modified to fit as a request by PsykoFerret for #ZTZ59D1 #Type59D1

ZTZ-96/ZTZ-96A | TYPE-96/TYPE-96A Digital Gunner Sight
Originally made by BarteG98PL for T64A but this perfectly works for ZTZ96 and ZTZ96A. I made some minor changes to suit my preference but you can edit stuff at your own will.
#ZTZ96
#ZTZ96A
#TYPE96
My first sight ever for the Amx-40! (Distance lines are up to 4.5 km!)

Schindibee's fictional missile sight for M113A1 TOW

#customsight #sight #fictional #m113 #m113a1 #tow #m113_tow

This is a fully fictional sight for the Italian and Chinese M113A1 TOW ATGM carriers:

The sight features a simple crosshair with a basic stadiametric rangefinder (helpful to quickly estimate distance to target) in the form of vertical lines: The lines have the height of a typical tank (2.5 meters) at a certain distance (400, 800, 1600 and 3200 meters) and are positioned so that they can measure the tank's hulls (length 7 meters).

The sight also shows the visible area when zoomed
